form.name: form1

img.title: Dr. Muchoney sings to AP Physics I Class in Plum Borough School District.
img.alt: Plum Teacher Gives the Gift of Song

div.a: Plum Teacher Gives the Gift of Song

span.span: Plum Senior High School Science Teacher, Dr. Dave Muchoney, gives the gift of song to keep a personal connection with his students while teaching under a Shelter in Place. Coursework is paramount, but maintaining positive student-teacher relationships is also an important factor in his classroom.

div.a: 2020 Online Kindergarten and First Grade Registration!

br.span: Still need to register your child for kindergarten and/or first grade? Plum Borough School District is registering students for these grade levels online! Click here for more information!
